column4: na ne mfɛfo Afarsakfo a wɔwɔ esuegya noho somae ma wɔdze kɛmaa ɔhen Darius no no nsusudo nye yi:"

column2: "Na n'ekyir no hɛn egyanom yii sor Nyankopɔn no ebufuw no

column3: nna ɔhen Sirus hyɛɛ mbra dɛ wonsi Nyankopɔn ne fi yi."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn ne fie sika na dwetɛ ndzɛmba a Nebukadenezar faa no wɔ asɔrdan a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no mu

column2: "Sesbazar yi ara na ɔbae bɛhyɛɛ Nyankopɔn fie a ɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no ase: na ofitsi ber no ara dze bodu sisei yi wɔdze no si ara

column6: dɛ ɔhen Sirus na ɔhyɛɛ mbra dɛ wonsi Nyankopɔn dan yi wɔ Jerusalɛm anaa
